message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $14,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm confident in the value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $13,750?
I'm still a bit above your target, but I'm willing to meet you at $13,500. Can you consider that?
